description: Police say they have interviewed them about suspected "criminal and/or health and safety offences".
title: Coronavirus: Five arrested in Isle of Man Abbotswood care home probe
title_page: Coronavirus: Five arrested in Isle of Man Abbotswood care home probe - BBC News
maintext: The Department of Health and Social Care stepped in to run the home on 13 April after an outbreak of the virus and residents were moved out the following month.
